column3:
@luke-jr Mind to solve the merge conflict?

Also, assigned 0.14 milestone, I think this is relatively trivial/uncontroversial refactoring.
@jonasschnelli Are your comments addressed by the feedback?\n

In theory, this should only be done when holding cs_wallet. I guess changing CWallet::strWalletFile to a `const std::string` is not possible with the current concept of setting the filename in a instance method.\nBut maybe I'm wrong.\n
Heh. This (unchanged) comment was wrong before and correct after this PR. :)\n
Maybe declare `CreateWalletFromFile()` private to avoid layer confusion?\n
wallet.h says "This lock protects all the fields added by CWallet except for: ... strWalletFile (immutable after instantiation)"\n
It's not really intended to be private...\n
